channel.title: India Forums Podcast
channel.description: India Forums Podcast - the latest news, reviews and star interviews from the world of Bollywood and Indian television stars, Top 10 Countdown, Retro Cafe
channel.itunes:author: India Forums
channel.itunes:keywords: Bollywood, Films, Movie Reviews, Top 10 Songs, Indian, Hindi, Gossips, Bollywood News, Celebrity Interviews

item.title: Retro Cafe #91 (Lata Mangeshkar Duets Special)
item.description: Retro Cafe take the trip down memory lane with Lata Mangeshkar and listen to some of her best duets with some of her favorite male co-singers.
item.itunes:subtitle: Retro Cafe take the trip down memory lane with Lata Mangeshkar and listen to some of her best duets with some of her favorite male co-singers.
item.itunes:summary: Retro Cafe is a nostalgic journey down memory lane, is an occasion to rejuvenate the evergreen melodies and a tribute to celebrate the Retro of India.

item.title: Retro Cafe #90 (Lori Special)
item.description: It was Mother Day week so Retro Cafe decided to relive the childhood, remember those loris/lullaby's that all grew up listening to, cherish those fond memories that all shared with their mother's.
